test_description: Verify Technician App synchronizes locally queued job status updates (WatermelonDB) to backend upon network restoration, resolving conflicts via Server-Wins strategy
business_risk: Critical - Data loss or state inconsistency leads to missed SLAs and billing errors
preconditions: Technician logged in; Job #12345 in 'Assigned' state; Device network disabled
test_steps: 1. Disable network on device; 2. Technician marks Job #12345 as 'In Progress'; 3. Admin reassigns Job #12345 to another tech on backend; 4. Enable network on device; 5. Trigger Sync
expected_result: Local status update rejected; Job #12345 removed from local DB; Conflict logged; Technician notified of reassignment
test_data_needs: Technician User; Service Request Record; Simulated Network Latency
dependencies: WatermelonDB Sync Engine; Backend Sync Endpoint
success_criteria: Zero data loss; Database consistency checksum passes
failure_impact: High - Technician works on unassigned job
data_setup_complexity: High - Requires specific DB state manipulation
cleanup_requirements: Reset Job status; Clear local DB
security_considerations: Sync payload encryption; JWT validity check on reconnect

test_description: Verify PostGIS Point-in-Polygon query correctly routes Service Request to Service Center A based on customer lat/long coordinates
business_risk: High - Requests assigned to wrong center causes delays and contract violations
preconditions: Service Center A defined with Polygon P1; Brand X authorized for SC A
test_steps: 1. Create Service Request via API with address coordinates inside Polygon P1; 2. Assert 'service_center_id' matches SC A
expected_result: Request routed to Service Center A

test_description: Validate WebSocket Gateway handles 1,000 concurrent technician location updates with broadcast latency under 2 seconds
business_risk: Medium - Laggy maps degrade user trust
preconditions: 1000 active socket connections simulated; Redis adapter configured
test_steps: 1. Connect 1000 technician clients; 2. Connect 1000 user clients; 3. Emit location updates at 1Hz; 4. Measure time-to-receive on user client
expected_result: 95th percentile latency < 2 seconds; Zero dropped messages
tools_required: k6 with WebSocket extension; Redis Monitor
